text: Ernest Juvara (May 5, 1870, Bârlad, Vaslui County – May 5, 1933, Bucharest) was a Romanian physician, innovative in surgical and instrumental techniques. He was a professor at the Faculty of Medicine of the University of Bucharest, with contributions in the field of bone prostheses, intestinal anastomoses and spinal anesthesia. He went to high school in Bucharest, after which he studied at the Faculty of Medicine of the University of Paris from 1888 to 1895. ==Publications== * * == References == Category:People from Bârlad Category:Romanian physicians Category:Carol Davila University of Medicine and Pharmacy faculty Category:1933 deaths Category:1870 births Category:University of Paris alumni Category:Romanian medical writers
title: Ernest Juvara
